code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import api from"../../utils/api";import{usePlayer}from"../../context/PlayerContext";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SongList=()=>{const[songs,setSongs]=useState([]);const[error,setError]=useState("");const{playSong}=usePlayer();useEffect(()=>{const fetchSongs=async()=>{try{const response=await api.get("/songs");setSongs(response.data);}catch(error){setError("Failed to fetch songs.
